name: Gunstable (macarowan)
description:
Welcome to Gunstable, a game in which you use an increasingly unstable gun to fight off hordes of enemies for [CONTRIVED REASON]. 

Use your arsenal of guns and also your big brain to manage resources and slam puny gunslingers. Good luck!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space Bar - Toggle Guns

1, 2, 3, 4 - Switch Guns

Left Click - Use primary gun

Right Click - Use secondary gun

Guns: 

LMG - Uses ammo and gives off heat

Vacuum- Sucks up enemies and refills ammo and goop

Flamethrower- Burns goop and gives off heat

Ice Beam- Uses energy and reduces heat

Goop Gun- Slows down enemies with goop

Goop Grenade- Slows down enemies with goop and ammo

Energy Beam- Mows down enemies with energy

Nuke Grenade- Explodes both ammo and energy
